generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road surface with visible lane markings and tram tracks, extending into the distance.
- sidewalk: Pedestrian walkways are visible on both sides of the road, separated by curbs and lined with poles and buildings.
- building: Multiple multi-story buildings with windows and commercial signage are visible along the street and in the background.
- pole: Several vertical poles are present, including traffic light poles and utility poles.
- traffic light: A traffic light is visible on the left side of the image, showing a green light.
- traffic sign: A blue parking sign with a "P" symbol is visible on the right side of the image.
- person: Multiple pedestrians are visible walking on the sidewalks and crossing the street.
- car: A silver car is visible driving on the road in the distance.
- vegetation: Some trees and greenery are visible in the background, behind the buildings.
- sky: The sky is visible above the buildings, appearing clear and bright.
- terrain: There is no visible grass or soil terrain in the image.
